abstract: United States Treasury announces imposition of sanctions on four North Koreans due to their connections with country's illicit weapons proliferation activities.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department said the North Koreans, and a North Korean company in Egypt, had links to their country’s weapons proliferation efforts.

headline.main: U.S. Sanctions 4 North Koreans, Including Myanmar Envoy
headline.print_headline: U.S. Treasury Imposes Sanctions on 4 North Koreans, Including Ambassador to Myanmar

snippet: The Treasury Department said the North Koreans, and a North Korean company in Egypt, had links to their country’s weapons proliferation efforts.
